meanings.sent1: Her precommitments to attend the meeting were well-known.
meanings.sent2: He made precommitments to finish the project on time.
meanings.sent3: The precommitments to help with the event were written in stone.
meanings.sent4: His precommitments to his family were like unbreakable chains.
meanings.sent5: The weight of her precommitments felt heavy on her shoulders.

meanings.sent1: Their precommitments to share the prize money were clear.
meanings.sent2: The precommitments between the two parties were finalized yesterday.
meanings.sent3: The precommitments to split the dessert evenly caused a funny argument.
meanings.sent4: Their precommitments were the foundation of their successful partnership.
meanings.sent5: The precommitments were like a roadmap for their future collaboration.
